caption:
This photograph features a group of four young men closely grouped together, facing the camera. The composition has a strong focus on their facial expressions and the details of their attire.

From the left, the first man is wearing glasses with large, clear frames. He has a tall afro hairstyle and a calm expression. He is dressed in a white shirt under a dark coat.

The second man from the left, who is in the foreground and slightly lower than the others, wears a stylish red beret tilted to one side. He gives a somewhat sceptical look with pursed lips, enhancing his prominent presence in the photo. His clothing consists of a black leather jacket over a dark shirt.

The third individual is partially obscured by the second man. His gaze is directed straight at the camera, indicative of a fearless demeanor. He is wearing a light-colored patterned shirt.

The man on the far right has a beard and an intense expression. He is dressed in a patterned shirt with paisley-like details in earth tones. His black hair and beard are well-groomed.

In the background, there is a weathered wall with fading paint, adding a gritty, urban texture to the scene. The lighting focuses on their faces, emphasizing their expressions and the textures of their clothing. The setting and attire suggest a scene from the 1970s or 1980s, reflecting a cultural moment with its own distinct fashion and attitude.
title: Street gang members
